name: aicoach
description: Full stack AiCoach application with mobile app, admin dashboard, and backend

scripts.build:mobile: cd mobile && npx expo export --platform web --output-dir web-build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:admin && npm run build:mobile
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd mobile && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..
